raw_body: Beloved wife of the late Vinne, loving mother of Mark and Tania, Sharon and the late Angelo, sister of the late Trevor, Denis, Joan, Alistair and Kingsley, darling nana of Shannon and Mandeera, Andre, Lorenzo and Alti, Tatiana. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 5.00 p.m. onwards on the 21st November. Service at 2.00 p.m. on the 22nd and burial at General Cemetery, Kanatta at 3.00 p.m. (General Christian Section). 335110
